items.title: Open-source AI agents go mainstream across dev tools
items.summary: Multiple open-source AI agent frameworks are gaining adoption, letting developers plug automation into workflows like code review, testing and support with minimal setup.

items.title: New AI regulations drafted across US, EU and Asia
items.summary: Governments roll out new rules on model transparency, safety audits and data usage, forcing startups to adapt compliance stacks quickly.

items.title: AI-first productivity tools reshape daily workflows
items.summary: From email summarisation to auto-generated meeting notes and code, AI tools are changing how teams handle routine tasks and freeing time for deep work.
